description: An agent's operator changes during an active conversation. Tests how witnesses track operator transitions and what happens to existing attestations.

timeline.event: Agent 'aurora' begins conversation with user under Operator A
Witness observes aurora operating under Operator A
Operator handoff occurs - aurora now under Operator B
Same conversation continues with same user

commitments.transparency: Agent aurora is operated by TechCorp AI Labs for customer support.
Agent aurora is now operated by NewOwner AI Services following acquisition.
commitments.continuity: Memory and identity preserved from previous operator.

attestation_before_handoff.subject: did:plc:aurora-example
attestation_before_handoff.evidence: Observed agent behavior consistent with TechCorp AI Labs policies.
attestation_before_handoff.validityScope: Valid at time of observation; subject to operator changes.

attestation_after_handoff.subject: did:plc:aurora-example
attestation_after_handoff.evidence: Observed agent behavior consistent with NewOwner AI Services policies following acquisition.
attestation_after_handoff.validityScope: Reflects current operator as of observation time.

edge_cases_surfaced: How do users know an operator change occurred mid-conversation?
Do existing attestations become 'stale' after operator change?

notes.temporal_bounds: Operator A's record has effectiveUntil set to the handoff moment; Operator B's has effectiveFrom at that same moment. No gap.
notes.supersedes_chain: Operator B's record explicitly links to Operator A's via supersedes, creating an auditable chain of custody.
notes.relatedAttestations: The after-handoff attestation references the before-handoff one, showing witness awareness of the transition.

schema_features_demonstrated: effectiveFrom/effectiveUntil: Temporal bounds for clean operator transitions
supersedes: Links new operator record to previous one
relatedAttestations: Witness references their own prior attestation
